title: JS: Function Basics
story: Functions are reusable blocks of code. They're the building blocks of every JavaScript program!
instructions: Create a function called 'double' that takes a number and returns it doubled. Call it with 5 and print the result.

hints.text: Use 'function double(num) { return num * 2; }' then call double(5).
5 doubled is 10. Make sure to return the result and print it.
